A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"I've got a bad feeling about this\" would be an understatement in summarizing episode 8. This movie is an anticlimactic disappointment with a pointless main story line and pointless side stories. The answers to questions from the previous installment in this series are neglected or answered in a most disappointing way.  Treatment of the most iconic Star Wars characters are unjust and not fitting to the original triology.
